definition[0]: a mark made by a foot or shoe
example[0]: We followed the footprints of a deer in the snow.
definition[1]: the amount of space on a desk that a computer uses
example[1]: PCs with a 50% smaller footprint than other models
definition[2]: the effect that a person’s or organization’s activities have on the environment
example[2]: Answer these questions to calculate your business’s environmental footprint.
definition[3]: the space on the surface of a desk that is filled by a computer
example[3]: These PCs have a 50% smaller footprint than previous models.
